marklogic.body:
Get up! Go home! You're through!HOSHIT EYE! Chapter title namedrop Has no one in middle earth heard of Heat radiation. That's friggin LAVA. The night after I first saw fellowship of the ring, the weekend it came out, I had a nightmare where the ringwraiths were chasing me as a Ms PacMan The ringwraith voices are even creepier when you have only one earbud working. Hi Rosie! that's craic, not crack this is the part where you scream and run Frodo If, when I get engaged, my sig other proposes with an engraven one ring, I will love them forever! Props to Serkis. That looked like it hurt. Great and Terrible? Like SMeyer and books, right? Sam just wants a , Gandalf! So you heard the entire conversation then But not foundry'd Scarecrow, you are not working! More singing. It's not as annoying in A/V form. drooling at set design for orthanc because it's in the script? wizard fight! Murphy is laughing at your ass Frodo Nother chapter title drop who doesn't want to sleep tonight? And on set injury here And DM of the Rings starts here
It comes in pints? Pip, you are Acting stupidly And this Aragorn don't have a bowl cut ANd here is one of the more annoying tropes… not actually annoying- loathsome The Achoo? yes, what about se nod breakfast an apple works More signing "Build me an army, worthy of Al Gore." Karma's a bitch, Saruman BAcon! count me in! Dude, run! This is not good Guess Aragorn read up on them in the Monster Manual And amazing Megature here Moth instead of Radagast the brown And the goop here is mostly lube More hobbity things Shadow realm? does that mean that Yugi is somewhere here? And here is one of my pet peeves with Liv Tyler's performance. She doesn't actually speak, just whispers loudly SCENERY PORN! Bad. Ass. ANd they actually got the horseheads in the foam. cool.
